@graph.name: Research Paper Analysis and Knowledge Graph
@graph.description: A research project analyzing a corpus of scientific papers, extracting topics, calculating similarities, and building a knowledge graph.

@graph.name: Research Papers Dataset
@graph.description: Collection of scientific papers for analysis

@graph.name: Analysis Results
@graph.description: Output files from the analysis, including visualizations and JSON data

@graph.name: Knowledge Graph (Turtle format)
@graph.description: RDF knowledge graph of papers with Wikidata links

@graph.description: Python script for modeling topics from paper abstracts

@graph.name: Paper Similarity Analysis
@graph.description: Python script for calculating similarity between papers

@graph.name: Acknowledgements NER Script
@graph.description: Python script for extracting entities from acknowledgements

@graph.name: Knowledge Graph Creation Script
@graph.description: Python script for creating RDF knowledge graph
